text: "Ego" is a 2009 song by Beyoncé for the deluxe edition of her third studio album I Am... Sasha Fierce. It was officially remixed by Kayne West and was nominated for a Grammy Award in 2010. It went to number 39 in the United States, number 60 in the United Kingdom, number 2 in the Netherlands, number 11 in New Zealand and number 29 in Sweden. ==Track listing== *US Singles & Dance Mixes"iTunes Store - Beyoncé - Ego / Sweet Dreams Singles & Dance Mixes" . iTunes Store (US). Apple Inc. 2009-08-17.
